title: Gallery with café? Artist Daniel Arsham opens new art-driven coffee and dessert restaurant in Dubai Mall
summary_full: Dubai Mall's Fashion Avenue welcomes Daniel's Room, a unique concept by artist Daniel Arsham. This space artfully blends specialty coffee, exclusive desserts and contemporary art, offering an immersive experience. More than a café, it is a cultural destination where design, objects and culinary delights intersect, inviting visitors to linger and explore.
